Nov. 5, 2005 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
John Hersey High School, Arlington Heights, Illinois, USA Most entertaining band: Fountain City Brass Band Best featured brass soloist: William Hess (baritone, Fountain City Brass Band) Best performance of a march: Motor City Brass Band (playing Death or Glory) Best new composition or arrangement: 'Tis a Gift (Michael Garasi) (played by Brass Band of Central Florida)
June 5, 2009, 1:06 p.m. Oct. 15, 2014, 10:31 a.m.
